@graph.name: Mung Bean Dal & Pigeon Pea Stew ( Vegan & Gluten-free) - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Mung Bean Dal and Pigeon Pea Stew. Mung Aur Toor Daal. Green mung bean and split pea soup. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe

itemListElement.name: Mung Bean Dal & Pigeon Pea Stew ( Vegan & Gluten-free)

@graph.name: Mung Bean Dal and Pigeon Pea Stew. Toor aur Mung Dal.Â
@graph.description: Mung Dal is a healthy and easy vegan Indian dal recipe that is the perfect fuss-free vegan main dish for a cold winter night. In this authentic Indian recipe protein-packed Mung/Moong bean dal (lentils) and split pigeon peans are cooked in the pressure cooker with warming Indian spices and a homemade chili garlic paste for some heat! Allergen Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast, nut, gluten.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup dried yellow mung bean (split mung bean, Mung Dal washed and soaked for at least an hour)
1/4 cup dried pigeon peas (toor dal, or any split pea, washed and soaked for an hour)
1.5-2 cups water (1.5 for a thicker consistency)
2 teaspoons organic canola oil or any organic oil with high smoke point
5-6  fresh curry leaves or 1 bay leaf

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep pan or pressure cooker, add oil and heat on medium
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep pan or pressure cooker, add oil and heat on medium

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard seeds and wait for them to sputter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard seeds and wait for them to sputter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add asafoetida, curry leaves/bay leaf and mix. Cook for half a minute
recipeInstructions.name: Add asafoetida, curry leaves/bay leaf and mix. Cook for half a minute

recipeInstructions.text: Add onions and ginger and cook until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onions and ginger and cook until translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chili garlic paste, coriander powder and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chili garlic paste, coriander powder and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomato, turmeric and cook for 2-3 minutes until tomatoes get mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomato, turmeric and cook for 2-3 minutes until tomatoes get mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: At this point, you can add chopped up vegetables, other spices, garam masala/curry powder.
recipeInstructions.name: At this point, you can add chopped up vegetables, other spices, garam masala/curry powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the lentils and add them to the pan, add salt, and water and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the lentils and add them to the pan, add salt, and water and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 1-2 whistle or cook covered on low for 20-30 minutes until the lentils are tender and mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 1-2 whistle or cook covered on low for 20-30 minutes until the lentils are tender and mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust salt, spices and water for consistency. Bring to a boil and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Adjust salt, spices and water for consistency. Bring to a boil and serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro leaves or red chili flakes, with Roti-Indian flatbread, Rice, dry veggie subzis or as a soup with garlic bread/pita/Naan.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro leaves or red chili flakes, with Roti-Indian flatbread, Rice, dry veggie subzis or as a soup with garlic bread/pita/Naan.

itemListElement.text: Soak a whole dry red chili pepper in warm water for 10 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Soak a whole dry red chili pepper in warm water for 10 minutes.

itemListElement.text: With a mortar and pestle, pound 5-6 cloves of garlic with the soaked chili and a few drops of vinegar.
itemListElement.name: With a mortar and pestle, pound 5-6 cloves of garlic with the soaked chili and a few drops of vinegar.

itemListElement.text: You can also use red chili powder and make a bigger batch in a food processor.
itemListElement.name: You can also use red chili powder and make a bigger batch in a food processor.
